title: Council Decision of 16 September 1996 appointing two members and three alternate members of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Midwives
header:
COUNCIL DECISION  of 16 September 1996 appointing two members and three alternate members of the Advisory Committee  on the Training of Midwives (96/C  290/01)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: Ms Renate GROSSBICHLER is hereby appointed a member of the Advisory  Committee on the Training of Midwives in place of Ms Ute GELLER for the remainder of the latter's  term of office, which ends on 22 October 1998.

Ms Margarita KINDL is hereby appointed a member of the Advisory Committee on the  Training of Midwives in place of Ms Eveline FUGGER for the remainder of the latter's term of  office, which ends on 22 October 1998.

Ms Eva Maria KIRKOVICS is hereby appointed an alternate member of the Advisory  Committee on the Training of Midwives in place of Ms Hannah RAUSCH for the remainder of the  latter's term of office, which ends on 22 Otober 1998.

Mr Lars PETERSEN is hereby appointed an alternate member of the Advisory Committee on  the Training of Midwives in place of Mr Geert AMSTRUP for the remainder of the latter's term of  office, which ends on 22 October 1998.

Ms Maria NOULA is hereby appointed an alternate member of the Advisory Committee on the  Training of Midwives in place of Ms Maria KAMMENOU for the remainder of the latter's term of  office, which ends on 22 October 1998.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 16 September 1996.
For the Council The President I. YATES
(1) OJ No L 33, 11. 2. 1980, p. 13.
(2) OJ No C 292, 7. 11. 1995, p. 2.
